properties.entry: SELECT YEAR_MONTH FROM ( SELECT TO_CHAR(PAYMENT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM') AS YEAR_MONTH, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY TO_CHAR(PAYMENT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM') ORDER BY PAYMENT_DATE DESC) AS rn FROM PAYMENT ) t WHERE rn = 1 ORDER BY YEAR_MONTH DESC
